public boolean begin(java.lang.String args)
Parse the arguments received from the web service and perform the appropriate actions

Parameters:
args - the arguments passed in. Contains either: * bpel_file=filename * id=number&action=display/pause/stop/start * bpel_file=filename&parents="type::name;..."¤t="type::name"&variables="name::value;..." NOTE: bpel_file can be replaced with bpel_text

true on success, fals otherwise
